content.question: The portrait of Sin Sukju, created in the fifteenth century, reflects the impact of Confucianism on Korean artistic traditions

choices.label: with its focus on compassion, self-awareness, and enlightenment
with its emphasis on the Way and yin and yang, the balance of opposites
with its focus on connecting to powerful spirits in the natural world
with its emphasis on duty, loyalty, respect, and ancestor worship

content.answer: with its emphasis on duty, loyalty, respect, and ancestor worship

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
